divs: Sighting Detailswe were home havibg dinner on the deck.My husband was facing opposite us. Hesaid he saw a ufo above us. i didnt believe it and thought he was kidding. Mynephew got up and turned around saying that i had better turn around. I did, andwas stunned - it was a glowing orange object above the tree in our neighborsyard but a distance away . As I looked it appeared to be stopped and thengetting larger. I feared it was coming in closer. It almost appeared to bedayglow - extrewmely bright. I backed off and my nepphew jumped over the deckonto a golf course as it began to slowly move. It then shot across the sky anddissappeared. I have not been able to find another report of a sighting in thisarea since then. I know it was something very unusual as it seemed static,glowed unbelievably and appeared to move towards us and then to the right.
